content: Don’t let its imposing size scare you too much - this battle isn’t as hard as many others in Chapter 2 despite being a secret boss, as long as you know when and where to attack.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Fuban.md', within the main section titled 'Fuban', specifically from the subsection 'Fuban Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Don’t let its imposing size scare you too much - this battle isn’t as hard as many others in Chapter 2 despite being a secret boss, as long as you know when and where to attack.
